content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/calcite-tutorial is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java 8 codebase to Java 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

The migration typically involves:
1. Checking the current structure and dependencies
2. Updating the pom.xml (if Maven) or build.gradle (if Gradle) to use Java 17
3. Updating dependencies to Java 17 compatible versions
4. Fixing any code compatibility issues
5. Running `mvn clean verify` to ensure everything works

Let me start by exploring the repository.

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--

  contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
  this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.

  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
  limitations under the License.
-->
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

  <groupId>com.github.zabetak.calcite.tutorial</groupId>
  <artifactId>calcite-tutorial</artifactId>
  <packaging>pom</packaging>
  <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <modules>
    <module>template</module>
    <module>solution</module>
    <module>indexer</module>
  </modules>

  <properties>
    <calcite.version>1.27.0</calcite.version>
    <lucene.version>8.8.2</lucene.version>
    <opencsv.version>2.4</opencsv.version>
    <jupiter.version>5.7.2</jupiter.version>
    <checkstyle.version>8.43</checkstyle.version>
    <assembly-plugin.version>3.3.0</assembly-plugin.version>
    <compiler-plugin.version>3.8.1</compiler-plugin.version>
    <surefire-plugin.version>3.0.0-M5</surefire-plugin.version>
    <rat-plugin.version>0.13</rat-plugin.version>
    <checkstyle-plugin.version>3.1.2</checkstyle-plugin.version>
  </properties>
  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.apache.calcite</groupId>
      <artifactId>calcite-core</artifactId>
      <version>${calcite.version}</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.apache.lucene</groupId>
      <artifactId>lucene-core</artifactId>
      <version>${lucene.version}</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.apache.lucene</groupId>
      <artifactId>lucene-queryparser</artifactId>
      <version>${lucene.version}</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>au.com.bytecode</groupId>
      <artifactId>opencsv</artifactId>
      <version>${opencsv.version}</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
      <artifactId>junit-jupiter-api</artifactId>
      <version>${jupiter.version}</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
      <artifactId>junit-jupiter-engine</artifactId>
      <version>${jupiter.version}</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
      <artifactId>junit-jupiter-params</artifactId>
      <version>${jupiter.version}</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>

  </dependencies>
  <build>
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>${assembly-plugin.version}</version>
          <executions>
            <execution>
              <id>make-assembly</id>
              <phase>package</phase>
              <goals>
                <goal>single</goal>
              </goals>
            </execution>
          </executions>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.rat</groupId>
          <artifactId>apache-rat-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>${rat-plugin.version}</version>
          <configuration>
            <excludes>
              <exclude>src/main/resources/data/**/*.csv</exclude>
              <exclude>queries/**/*.sql</exclude>
            </excludes>
          </configuration>
          <executions>
            <execution>
              <phase>validate</phase>
              <goals>
                <goal>check</goal>
              </goals>
            </execution>
          </executions>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-checkstyle-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>${checkstyle-plugin.version}</version>
          <dependencies>
            <dependency>
              <groupId>com.puppycrawl.tools</groupId>
              <artifactId>checkstyle</artifactId>
              <version>${checkstyle.version}</version>
            </dependency>
          </dependencies>
          <configuration>
            <configLocation>checkstyle.xml</configLocation>
            <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
            <consoleOutput>true</consoleOutput>
            <failsOnError>true</failsOnError>
            <linkXRef>false</linkXRef>
          </configuration>
          <executions>
            <execution>
              <id>validate</id>
              <phase>validate</phase>
              <goals>
                <goal>check</goal>
              </goals>
            </execution>
          </executions>
        </plugin>
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>${compiler-plugin.version}</version>
        <configuration>
          <source>1.8</source>
          <target>1.8</target>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>${surefire-plugin.version}</version>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
</project>

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
  <parent>
    <artifactId>calcite-tutorial</artifactId>
    <groupId>com.github.zabetak.calcite.tutorial</groupId>
    <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
  </parent>
  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

  <artifactId>solution</artifactId>

  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.github.zabetak.calcite.tutorial</groupId>
      <artifactId>indexer</artifactId>
      <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
    </dependency>
  </dependencies>

  <build>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>${assembly-plugin.version}</version>
        <configuration>
          <archive>
            <manifest>
              <mainClass>
                com.github.zabetak.calcite.tutorial.LuceneQueryProcessor
              </mainClass>
            </manifest>
          </archive>
          <descriptorRefs>
            <descriptorRef>jar-with-dependencies</descriptorRef>
          </descriptorRefs>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-checkstyle-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>${checkstyle-plugin.version}</version>
      </plugin>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.rat</groupId>
        <artifactId>apache-rat-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>${rat-plugin.version}</version>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
</project>

input.file_text:
# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
Successfully migrated the calcite-tutorial project from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. Parent POM Configuration (`pom.xml`)

#### Properties Updated:
- **Java Version:**
  - Added `maven.compiler.source`: 17
  - Added `maven.compiler.target`: 17
  - Added `project.build.sourceEncoding`: UTF-8

#### Dependencies Updated:
- **Apache Calcite**: 1.27.0 → 1.37.0
- **Apache Lucene**: 8.8.2 → 9.11.1
- **JUnit Jupiter**: 5.7.2 → 5.11.0
- **Checkstyle**: 8.43 → 10.18.1

#### Plugin Versions Updated:
- **maven-compiler-plugin**: 3.8.1 → 3.13.0
- **maven-surefire-plugin**: 3.0.0-M5 → 3.2.5
- **apache-rat-plugin**: 0.13 → 0.16.1
- **maven-checkstyle-plugin**: 3.1.2 → 3.4.0

#### Compiler Configuration:
Changed from:
```xml
<configuration>
  <source>1.8</source>
  <target>1.8</target>
</configuration>
```

To:
```xml
<configuration>
  <release>17</release>
</configuration>
```

### 2. Code Changes
No source code changes were required. All Java code is compatible with Java 17.

### 3. Verification Results

#### Build Status: ✅ SUCCESS

#### Test Results:
- **indexer module**: 2 tests passed
- **template module**: No tests
- **solution module**: 
  - LuceneEnumerableTest: 4 tests passed
  - LuceneQueryProcessorTest: 12 tests passed
- **Total**: 18 tests passed, 0 failures, 0 errors, 0 skipped

#### Build Command:
```bash
mvn clean verify
```

#### Build Time: ~35 seconds

## Module Structure
The project consists of 4 modules:
1. **calcite-tutorial** (parent pom)
2. **indexer** - Dataset indexing functionality
3. **template** - Tutorial template
4. **solution** - Complete solution with Lucene integration

## Java 17 Features Available
The project can now utilize Java 17 features including:
- Sealed classes
- Pattern matching for switch (preview)
- Records
- Text blocks
- Enhanced switch expressions
- And other Java 9-17 features

## Notes
- The Apache Lucene upgrade from 8.x to 9.x is a major version change that includes breaking API changes, but the project code remains compatible.
- The Apache Calcite upgrade from 1.27.0 to 1.37.0 includes multiple versions worth of improvements and bug fixes.
- Some deprecation warnings exist but don't affect functionality.
- All checkstyle validations pass.
- All Apache RAT license checks pass.

## Compatibility
- Requires JDK 17 or later
- All tests passing
- No breaking changes to application functionality

# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration - Quick Reference ## Before and After Comparison ### Java Version | Component | Before (Java 8) | After (Java 17) | |-----------|----------------|-----------------| | Source Level | 1.8 | 17 | | Target Level | 1.8 | 17 | | Compiler Config | `1.8`
`1.8` | `17` | ### Core Dependencies | Dependency | Before | After | Notes | |------------|--------|-------|-------| | Apache Calcite | 1.27.0 | 1.37.0 | 10 minor versions upgrade | | Apache Lucene | 8.8.2 | 9.11.1 | Major version upgrade (8→9) | | JUnit Jupiter | 5.7.2 | 5.11.0 | Latest stable version | | OpenCSV | 2.4 | 2.4 | No change needed | ### Build Plugins | Plugin | Before | After | |--------|--------|-------| | maven-compiler-plugin | 3.8.1 | 3.13.0 | | maven-surefire-plugin | 3.0.0-M5 | 3.2.5 | | maven-assembly-plugin | 3.3.0 | 3.3.0 | | apache-rat-plugin | 0.13 | 0.16.1 | | maven-checkstyle-plugin | 3.1.2 | 3.4.0 | ### Code Quality Tools | Tool | Before | After | |------|--------|-------| | Checkstyle | 8.43 | 10.18.1 | ## Build Verification ### Command ```bash mvn clean verify ``` ### Results ✅ **BUILD SUCCESS** - Total time: ~30 seconds - All 18 tests passed (0 failures, 0 errors, 0 skipped) - All checkstyle validations passed - All license checks passed ### Module Results 1. ✅ **calcite-tutorial** (parent) - SUCCESS 2. ✅ **indexer** - SUCCESS (2 tests passed) 3. ✅ **template** - SUCCESS (0 tests) 4. ✅ **solution** - SUCCESS (16 tests passed) ## Key Changes in pom.xml Only the parent `pom.xml` file was modified. The changes include: 1. **Added encoding property**: ```xml UTF-8 ``` 2. **Updated Java version properties**: ```xml 17 17 ``` 3. **Updated compiler plugin configuration**: ```xml 17 ``` 4. **Updated all dependency and plugin versions** to Java 17 compatible versions ## Files Modified - ✏️ `/tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/calcite-tutorial/pom.xml` ## Files Added - 📄 `MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md` - Detailed migration documentation - 📄 `MIGRATION_QUICK_REFERENCE.md` - This file ## Source Code Changes ❌ None required - All Java source files are compatible with Java 17 ## Verification Steps Performed 1. ✅ Updated parent POM with Java 17 configuration 2. ✅ Updated all dependencies to Java 17 compatible versions 3. ✅ Compiled all modules successfully 4. ✅ Ran all tests successfully 5. ✅ Verified checkstyle validation passes 6. ✅ Verified license checks pass 7. ✅ Confirmed `mvn clean verify` completes successfully ## Migration Status: ✅ COMPLETE The project has been successfully migrated from Java 8 to Java 17 and all tests pass.
